message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $110, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125. It's the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $120, which is the price I'm willing to pay for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
